CustomField.formula: IF(ProfileCompletion__c == 0.2 , "⚫⚫⚪⚪⚪⚪⚪⚪⚪⚪ 20%" , '') + IF(ProfileCompletion__c == 0.35 , "⚫⚫⚫◐⚪⚪⚪⚪⚪⚪35%" , '') + IF(ProfileCompletion__c == 0.4 , "⚫⚫⚫⚫⚪⚪⚪⚪⚪⚪40%" , '') + IF(ProfileCompletion__c == 0.5 , "⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫⚪⚪⚪⚪⚪50%" , '') + IF(ProfileCompletion__c == 0.55 , "⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫◐⚪⚪⚪⚪55%" , '') + IF(ProfileCompletion__c == 0.65 , "⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫◐⚪⚪⚪65%" , '') + IF(ProfileCompletion__c == 0.7 , "⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫⚪⚪⚪70%" , '') + IF(ProfileCompletion__c == 0.8 , "⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫⚪⚪ 80%" , '') + IF(ProfileCompletion__c == 0.85 , "⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫◐⚪ 85%" , '') + IF(ProfileCompletion__c == 1, "⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫⚫100%" , '')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: First Name: 20% Last Name: 20% (mandatory) Salutation :15 % Mailing Country: 15% Nationality: 15% Birthdate: 15%
CustomField.label: Profil Completion Image
